channel.title: [Delta/Allstar] Custom wings, making it so they stick to the character
channel.description: Hello, in my source, There are custom wings which I need to stay attached to the character when they use special abilities like ::fly, I have tried adding anims for them related to skillcapes, but it did nothing. Any Ideas?
